ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you for your response.  Ok, I ve found all the ingredients they talk about except the sketches.  Where can I get the sketches?  Also, why are they marked
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you for your response. Ok, I've found all the ingredients they talk
about except the sketches. Where can I get the sketches? Also, why are
they marked with an asterisk???
Thanks.
Rugga
